thread.title: WILLIAM L
thread.title_full: Prestige Flowers reviewed by WILLIAM L

author: WILLIAM L
title: WILLIAM L
text: Great website, very professional feel, however i did not give 5 stars as the tick boxes are very easy to miss and often lead to you paying much more than the original stamp price. I would also like to see more info on the additional items that can come with the flowers, for example i paid for extra luxury chocolates but i would have liked to view them closer and see what they actually are.
